tagline: A fully-fledged MMORPG mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
body:
SkyNet is an experimental MMORPG modification for Bethesda's [The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim](http://www.elderscrolls.com/skyrim/).

SkyNet intends to focus heavily on roleplay and immersion, instead of just being multiplayer slapped on top of Skyrim, like previous multiplayer modifications. It uses [Alexander Blade's Script Dragon](http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?altname=skyrim_script_dragon) to manipulate the game API with a mixed-mode (CLR/Native) plugin, which allows us to use C# as well as native C++, making our development and debug cycles considerably faster.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: SkyNet
